entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect error message when trying to dynamically invoke a method of an interface #101320
  • [API Proposal]: In TarEntry objects emitted by TarReader, make the offset to the entry data in enclosing stream a public property #101314
  • [API Proposal]: Expand GetValueOrDefault in CollectionExtensions to allow IDictionary, not just IReadOnlyDictionary #101311
  • coreclr + vsdbg failure to get stack trace from remote Kubernetes pod #101310
  • [API Proposal]: add ArrayBufferWriter<T>.WrittenSpan alternative that returns Span instead of ReadOnlySpan #101309
  • [API Proposal]: Allow Hook for Custom Resource Deserialization (BinaryFormatter) #101301
  • Loader-related error messages are *extremely* unhelpful. #101298
  • Expression.New() validator throws exception on implicit conversion of structs to interfaces #101296
  • [API Proposal] Channel.CreateBoundedPrioritized #101292
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpMetricsTest_Http20.AllSocketsHttpHandlerCounters_Success_Recorded item comparison failure #101285
  • Port FEATURE_DOUBLE_ALIGNMENT_HINT to native AOT #101284
    Future
  • [mono] [wasi][wasm] Wasm AOT breaks wasm export functions #101276

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Valuestopwatch #101319
  • Support specifying rundown keyword in EventPipe #100871
    9.0.0
  • Configuration binder don't bind properties in some cases #101278
  • [NativeAOT] osx-arm64 build error: compact unwind compressed function offset doesn't fit in 24 bits #93044
  • DependencyContext RuntimeGraph expected behavior. #94305
  • System.Net test issue #101300
  • Improve AppModel inner dev loop #43705
    9.0.0
  • Request: Include assembly version in stacktrace when ShowILOffsets on #101282
  • [API Proposal]: SHAKE squeezing #99645
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json Polymorphism Type Discriminator Does Not Support Subtypes Class Polymorphism #101286
  • Publishing as NativeAOT should not depend on AppHost #79575
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Runtime.CompilerServices.UnsafeTests.BitCast #101034
    9.0.0
  • We're attempting to retrieve a list of secrets from the AWS Parameter Store using .NET Core 8. To make external API calls, we included a certificate in the Lambda's environment variables with the **key** SSL_CERT_DIR and the **value** /opt/certs. However, after adding this variable, we encountered a certificate error while retrieving data from the parameter store. It worked fine without the SSL_CERT_DIR environment variable. How can we resolve this issue? #101280
  • ComVariantMarshaller type bug #101275
  • Test failure: PlatformNotSupportedException: Blocking wait is not supported on the JS interop threads #101100
    9.0.0
  • Add async proxy resolution on Windows 8 #30206
  • HttpClient is not providing complete certificate chain on windows #30417

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary indirect use of managed wcslen/EqualityComparer.Default from AppContext setup #101318
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Merge JIT/Methodical tests into the merged runners #101317
    area-Infrastructure
  • Prefer most derived member in Configuration Binder source generator #101316
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [Wasm] Integrate static web asset endpoints into wasm sdk #101315
    area-Build-mono
  • [Testing] Merge #91646 into release/8.0-staging #101313
    area-Infrastructure, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Optimize startup vtable setup #101312
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reapply params ReadOnlySpan overloads without params keyword #101308
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] disable live ILLink in a different way #101307
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • TypeDescriptor threading fixes #101306
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • TypeDescriptor threading fixes #101305
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Refresh our "dev-innerloop" pipeline jobs #101304
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: optimize popped boxes in the importer #101303
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix an assertion when a method doesn't set its return value #101299
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for Sve.UnzipEven/Odd & Sve.ZipHighLow #101294
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable control flow guard for mono on windows #101293
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.LoadVector*ZeroExtendTo*() #101291
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][interp] Resolve virtual method on delegates created by compiled code #101290
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Use common CodeGen::genHomeRegisterParams #101288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] More meaningful code in browser template #101287
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Enable printing disassembly instructions under release mode for JitDisasm. #101281
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Linker dependency framework #101277
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • fix Alpine build break #101302
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, source-build
  • Reduce Linq usage in FileSystemGlobbing #98109
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • ForceCatchHandlerFound feature #101255
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] simdhash tweaks #101082
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [cdac] link a stub contract descriptor if cdac-build-tool is not available #101297
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, source-build
  • Allow user to specify a rundown keyword to override the default. #101189
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Merge #91634 into release/8.0-staging #100994
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [wasm] Optimize out references to a bunch of BCL methods during JS interop startup #101217
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove Win7 Helix queues #100985
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.6
  • [release/6.0-staging] Remove Windows 7 helix queues #100988
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.31
  • [release/7.0-staging] Remove Win7 Helix queues #100986
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reuse more templates in our build #101197
    area-Infrastructure
  • [cdac] cdac-build-tool #100650
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Workaround for build failure in `cdacreader` when `EmitCompilerGeneratedFiles=true` #101279
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Vector128<T> wrong throw helper call #101258
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • SHAKE Read, Reset, and Clone #101262
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Stop building AppHost in native AOT testing #101270
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] make slow Utf8JsonWriterTests tests OuterLoop #101283
    arch-wasm, area-System.Text.Json, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Extend the copy propagation type check to local field cases #101256
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] faster memory view refresh + cleanup #101249
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Pass GitHubRepositoryName as a build argument. #101241
    source-build
  • Ignore ControlFlowGuard outside Windows #101268
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable control flow guard for AOT compilers #101269
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement a JSON contract reader #100966
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [cdac] Read contract descriptor from target #101208
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Add some basic guidelines around using C++ standard headers now that our build allows us to #101088
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove some volatile use on objects in corelib #100969
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Don't use SyncTextWriter in single-threaded wasm builds #101221
    arch-wasm, area-CoreLib-mono
  • Remove more helper frames #100939
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Fix class construction cycle in Lock on NativeAOT #100374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix mismatch between boxed/unboxed method entrypoints #99443
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Move profile checking back until just before inlining #101011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono] UnsafeAccessor: Enable tests for extern static methods without type parameters #101265
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] crashinfo.cpp/crashinfounix.cpp: use off_t instead of off64_t #101272
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix data race leading to a deadlock when opening QuicStream #101250
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Adjust the calleeSavedRegs on top frame for LoongArch64/RISCV64 #100962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Tensor prototype #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use BigMul in BigMul #100918
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix ConvertDllsToWebCil stack dump on bad input to be error message with input path #101162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Http CI test #101264
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Run trimming tests as AOT tests #101229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reduce frozen collection creation overheads for ignore-case with ASCII values #100998
    area-System.Collections
  • Fix running tests with process isolation under naot #100331
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mt] Add signalR WBT on WASM browser app #100723
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix AV in host from tracing on exit #101260
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 6.0.x
  • [mono][wasm] Fix function signature mismatch in m2n invoke #101106
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Arm64/Sve: Predicated Abs, Predicated/UnPredicated Add, Conditional Select #100743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • [browser][MT] stop doing grow(0) #101248
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] enable jiterp #101252
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Fix regression from RuntimeType.AllocateValueType rewrite #101137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Miscellaneous startup optimizations #101263
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Create separate attribute for warning behavior differences #101220
    needs-area-label
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
